Rokt | www.rokt.com | Sydney, Australia | ONSITE

Software Engineers (Clojure)

Rokt is hiring thoughtful, talented functional programmers, at all levels, to expand our Clojure team in Sydney. (We're looking for people who already have the right to work in Australia, please.)

Rokt is a successful startup (~150 employees) with a transaction marketing platform used by some of the world's largest ecommerce sites. Our Sydney-based engineering team is doing behind-the-scenes work for a business that is growing rapidly around the world, supported by our recent successful Series B round.

You'd be joining the team responsible for Rokt's "Data & Integrations Platform", responsible for connecting our systems to those of our advertisers and partner sites.

Advertising might not be saving the world, but it's not going away (cliche alert!), and at Rokt, we have a thoughtful team of people who are making it better -- for the consumer as well as the advertiser.

Contact me at sam.roberton@rokt.com
